111121.content:
(The writer of this chapter wishes to remain anonymous.)

Ayane stomped throughout the concrete jungle, crushing any automobiles and civilians underneath her crystal high heels that were unfortunate enough to get her way. She stopped in the middle of downtown, where several people were gathered at her giant feet. She looked all of the little humans at her feet, some cowering, some crying, some panting like dogs. They were such a unique and interesting bunch. Carefully maneuvering herself, she gently bent down without knocking down any buildings with her ass. She carefully plucked a handful of suspecting people and held them to eye level.

Such a unique bunch, Ayane thought. On her hand was a cowering obese man, a perverse skinny man who looked like he was about to blow his load at any moment, a woman hiding her two small children by her back, and a black hooded man who simply stared at her. Deep into her. Deep into her eyes. Ayane was a trained assassin who had been taught to not let emotion get in the way of her work, but this man, despite his inferior stature, caused an unruly stir within her. This man had to be taken care of immediately.

Ayane placed the other people high on top of a building and kept a close eye on them so they would not escape. At the same time, she gripped the black hooded man as tight as she could. Despite the pain that he felt, he showed no emotion.

Ayane had had enough of this.

"Stop staring at me, you gross little man."

The man flashed a small smile, then spoke.

"You think you're all powerful? Because you can destroy this entire city with your feet? Well, let me tell you something, Ayane,"

Ayane gasped once her named was uttered. Who was this man?

"You're nothing. You're weaker than the former people who are now plastered to the bottom of the slippers. You're pathetic. Why are you doing this?"

"You dare question me!"

Ayane couldn't take anymore. She squeezed her hands as tight as she could, hoping to kill the man. A satisfying pop followed by warm liquid surrounding the tips of her fingers indicated that the eccentric, quasi-scient man was dead. But his words would remain eternal inside the deep dark recess of her mind.

She averted her attention back to her captives. They hadn't moved, but she did notice a slight change in all of their demeanor; they were scared shitless. The previous actions had all been monitored by the few individuals on the rooftop. They knew now not to question their goddess. Not only to remain obedient, but also subservient. All of the individuals looked on as they awaited Ayane's next move.

Ayane moved quickly, picking up the mother who had tried to hard to hide her children. She purposely left the children on the rooftop to watch her handiwork. Ayane had been questioned, outwitted, and intellectually defeated by the man she just killed. Even though she had won the physical battle, she had lost the conflict overall. She had to redeem herself. She had to prove herself superior than these bugs, even if it was just one who questioned her.

"Take a look kiddies, this is what happens when you upset Ayane."

Ayane stuck her tongue out. Ayane took the mother who was screaming for her life and placed her on the tip of her tongue. Slowly, she pulled her tongue back into her mouth. The mother was at an impass. She could accept her fate as lunch meat or end her life on her own terms. She made a decision.

Throughout her life she had been an independent woman. Taking crap from no one, doing her best to be 100% self-sufficient. She had taught her kids to do the same. Don't ask for help, do everything you can by yourself. You are your own person. Do not let anyone control you.

The women took a deep breath, spread her arms out, and ran off the edge of the tongue. Ayane was shocked! She tried to intercept the woman's downward spiral, but failed, nearly knocking down an apartment in the process. She looked down as the woman hit the pavement, her body exploding upon impact.

The obese man was kind enough to distract the kids from watching her mother fall to her death.

Ayane was once again frustrated. Again, something did not go to plan. In anger, she kicked over a building. Cement, wires, and hard iron went flying across the city while the partly demolished apartment tumbled down to the ground. Ayane was angry! She was going to teach this town not to mess with her. And use her captives as examples. She turned to the building that they were on and saw that...

132132221.content:
You awoke one day on Pandora, shortly after arriving to become a Vault Hunter. A sharp pain pierces through your head as you struggle to remember what happened. As you slowly begin to recollect the memories, a Skag runs by, measuring in around 60 ft compared to you. Now that you're a bit more aware, everything looks a lot bigger... Or atleast you're smaller. As you begin a psychological hunt about how big the universe really is, you're train of thought is interrupted by a large boom. A few more follow it, the sounds leading to a teenage girl with her bright auburn hair in pigtails. If you were actually normal size, you'd probably start hitting on her immediatley; but there's no time for that! You have to figure out what the hell is going on here...

You leap onto her shoe as she walks into a nearby shed, seeming to be a makeshift workshop of some kind. You drop off upon entering, and the giant door closes behind you. There were many amazing machines you could only assume she made, but you were not sure. There's time for admiring the work later, when you're normal sized. For now, you need her help. You climb up her workbench, being careful not to fall, as not to have to work on climbing up again. Upon climbing up, you see her begin to look around as she hears you're tiny pleas for help. She finally looks down and sees you in all your tiny glory. You are easily startled when she swipes you up in her hand and other, artificial hand. She closes her eyes, begins jumping up and down, and squeals like a school girl. Then again, she is one, but... Whatever. She begins speaking. "Ohmigawd! You are so. Friggin. ADORABLE!" You are practically blown back as she screams excitedly at you, and your current small stature isn't helping with that at all. You looked back at her after clearing a drop of spit from your face. She seems to be thinking of what to do to you... But what could be in store, an what could you do about it? You're not exactly in fit shape to fight back if anything goes wrong, and they don't make guns for people who are 5 inches tall. What happens to you..?

15533222222222122111.content:
Another explosion rocked the base as I ran for the Normandy. Rounds flying past my head. Liara ran up the platforms to the open door of the Normandy as Joker shot at the Collectors. A piece of the base fell and knocked the platforms down. Without missing a beat, I took a running jump. Time slowed for a second as I realized, I wasn’t going to make it. My torso slammed onto the floor of the airlock. Liara and Miranda both reached down and pulled me up. I turned around and gave one last look at the Collectors as the airlock doors closed. Joker hobbled back to the piolet’s seat as EDI said.

         “Detonation in 10, 9, 8” She was cut off by Joker.

         “Yeah I get the gist of it EDI! Hold on!” Joker flew out of the base. I stood behind him.

         “Get to the relay!” I yelled. Joker punched it as the base exploded behind us. The fireball getting ever closer.

         “Come on baby.” Joker mumbled as his fingers flowed over the controls, trying calculate the jump. Just as we were about the jump, the ship violently shook. We jumped, for all of three seconds. Then the Normandy came to a sudden stop.

         “What’s going on Joker?” I asked impatiently.

         “Don’t know, but if I had to guess the fireball must’ve hit us. Most of my controls are offline. EDI, any idea where we are or how we can get moving again?” I looked over to where EDI’s hologram appears, but this time it did not appear. There was silence.

         “EDI?” I said. “EDI, are you there?” No response. “I’m going to go to EDI’s core. See if I can figure out whats wrong. Keep trying to get the ship moving, and see if you can figure out where we are.”

         “No promises.” Joker said. I turned around and headed towards the elevator in the back of the CIC. The eerie feeling still hung over the CIC as most of the chairs were, and would forever be, empty. I was too slow. The elevator doors opened and I hit the button for the third deck. The doors closed and the elevator started to descend.

         A mix of feelings filled my body. Joy and relief that Collectors, and by extension the Reapers, had been stopped or slowed. Worry that EDI suddenly wasn’t responding and that we had no idea where we were. Anger at myself for losing so many. I felt a single tear fall from my eye. The elevator doors suddenly opened. Surprised by the doors opening, I straighten up and wiped the tear away. I had work to do.

         I walked over to the medical bay and through the door in the back that lead to EDI’s AI core. Once I was inside the problem was obvious. A giant piece of the Collector base was jammed into once of EDI’s processors. I grabbed ahold of it and gave it a yank. Suddenly it hummed to life. I let go of it and scanned it with my omni-tool. Before I got too far I was thrown back. I slammed into one of EDI’s undamaged processors and was knocked unconscious.

         My head throbbed as I slowly woke up. I let out a groan and stood up. My eyes opened and I couldn’t believe what they saw. I was still in EDI’s core, but everything was gigantic. My brain was running a million miles an hour to figure out what happened. Suddenly the door opened. I turned to see a giant Miranda enter the room. She was still in her Cerberus uniform. It had a few tears here and there from the battle.

         “Shepard?” Her giant voice boomed. The door closed behind her. I went to get her attention, when suddenly I was hit with a realization. Miranda craves power. She’d never admit it, but I had seen the way she acts. She does everything possible to get power, and at this size she’d have complete power over me. I was small enough I could hide amongst EDI’s processors. Both options where valid, but I had to make up my mind quickly.
15533222222222122111.title: The Perfect Giantess

155332222222221221111.content:
She may be power hungry, but I still need her help. I thought. I started jumping up and down as I waved my arms above my head.

         “Miranda!” I yelled. “I’m down here!”

         “Guess that why EDI isn’t responding, and where the burst came from.” She mumbled to herself. She walked over to the Collector base piece.

         “Miranda! Don’t touch that!” I yelled.

         “What’s that sound?” She asked. “Is someone there? Show yourself.”

         “Down here! I’m down here!” Miranda turned her head down. A confused look suddenly appeared on her face.

         “What the...” She said. She activated her omni-tool and scanned me. The tool told her who I was. “What? Impossible.” She said. Miranda turned off her tool, and picked me up. The world flew by at an alarming rate. I was brought to a sudden stop. In front of me was a giant blue eye.

         “Shepard?!” She yelled. “How did you get so small?!” She brought me back from her face a little and flattened out her hand. I stood up and said.

         “I don’t know Miranda. I came down here to fix EDI, when I was somehow launched into one of EDI’s processors, and knocked out cold. When I woke up everything was big and you walked in.”

         “Well I know what knocked you back. A burst of energy that originated in this room.”

         “Must’ve been from the piece of the Collector base.” I said. “But that doesn’t explain why I’m so small.”

         “Look Shepard, we need to find out why you’re small. I suggest we take you to Mordin. See if he can fix this.” I didn’t like the idea of being poked at by Mordin.

         “Has Joker figured out why we aren’t moving?” I asked.

         “Last I heard something was wrong with the engines. He said that the outer casings had been knocked out of place.”

         “So we aren’t going anywhere, are we?”

         “Not unless someone goes outside to try and realign the casings. Now let’s go see Mordin.” With that Miranda started to head to the elevator. I was lost my balance for a second with the sudden forward movement. Miranda moved her hand down next to her flat belly. Each step she took make me lose my balance even more. We didn’t even make it out of the med-lab before I fell back in her hand.

         I was terrified. At whatever height I was at, Miranda looked like a skyscraper. It felt like the ground was ground was miles away from me. It was even worse when I looked up. Though her boobs blocked part of her face. If I was this scared about such a height difference, how would I feel as Mordin started poking me with whatever tools he uses. Miranda got into the elevator and took it up to the second deck. She walked into Mordin’s lab.

         “Mordin, Commander Shep…ard…” She stopped when she realized that Mordin wasn’t in his lab. “Where is he?”

         “He could be in the cargo hold.” I said. “There was a lot of debris there.”

         “Mordin would be all over that stuff.” Miranda said. Without another word, she took me back to the elevator and we rode it down to the cargo hold. The cargo hold had been hit pretty bad. A giant drone from the Collectors had drilled its way in. The containment shields had been activated, so the holes created by the drone were not a problem. In the middle of the room was a blob of something, but no one was here.

         “Hey Miranda.” I called out. “What’s that stuff?” I pointed towards the blob.

         “I don’t know.” She said. Miranda started walking over to it. As we got closer I noticed it wasn’t a blob. It was what remained of my team, and they were all shrunk.

         “Looks like you weren’t the only one effected by the energy blast.” Miranda said. She bent down and sent me down.

         “Of course, the Cheerleader is the only one that didn’t shrink!” Jack yelled.

         “What’s going on Shepard?” Tali asked.

         “I don’t know. I was hoping that Mordin could figure this out, but looks like I was wrong.” I said looking at Mordin.

         “Not true. Have theories. Need to get to lab.” Mordin said.

         “As much as I would love to get back to normal size.” Garrus said. “I think it’s more important that we get to the Citadel. They have better equipment then we do.”

         “Getting anywhere is going to be a problem.” Miranda said. “The engines are broken. Only way to fix them is if someone goes outside.”

         “Then why the fuck aren’t you out there?! Does the perfect princess not know what to do?” Jack yelled again.

         “Jack! Calm down.” I yelled.

         “Calm down?! Don’t you tell me to calm down Shepard! I knew I couldn’t trust you or Cerberus! Make me big now or I will throw you into one of those fans!” Jack screamed pointing to one of the nearby vents. Before I could say a word, a giant hand came down and lifted Jack up by one of her legs.

         “You’re not going to do anything at this size.” Miranda said, dangling Jack in front of her face.

         “Let go of me bitch!” Jack yelled. She then began to glow blue with biotic energy. A powerful blast of biotic energy slammed into Miranda’s face. All it did was make Miranda close her eyes. I was stunned. The most powerful biotic I had ever meet, and all she could get a giant Miranda to do was close her eyes.

         “Told you so.” Miranda said.

         “Knock it off you two!!” I screamed. “Miranda put Jack down!”

         “Of course Shepard.” She laid Jack on her back in the middle of the group.

         “I suggest that we find Joker, then figure out what the best thing for us to do is.”

         “Commander-” Miranda started.

         “That wasn’t a request.” I said.

         “Alright Shepard, but how are the six of you going to get to the upper decks? I can only carry so many.”

         “I have an idea.” Samara said. “Myself and two other could stay down here while Miss. Lawson takes the other three to go look for Mr. Moreau. After you’ve found him, Miss. Lawson takes the three that went with her and places them on the table in the lab. She could then come back here and retrieve the rest of us.”

         “I like that idea.” I said. “Alright who is going to stay?”

         “The less time with the Cheerleader the better!” Jack yelled.

         “I guess I’ll stay too. Try and keep Jack where you can find her.” Garrus said.

         “Alright, Shepard, Tali, and Mordin hop on.” Miranda said lowering her hand. The three of use climbed aboard. I took a seat.

         “Sit down.” I said. “It’s gonna get a bit bumpy.” The two looked at each other then sat down. Miranda’s hand was lifted off the ground and we headed back to the elevator. It didn’t take us long to find Joker. He was shrunk in his chair. Miranda careful lifted him up and took the four of us to Mordin’s lab. After setting us on the table she left to get the other three.

         “Mordin.” I said. “Earlier you mentioned that you had some theories about what happened. Care to inform the rest of us about them?”

         “Past theories irrelevant.” He replied.

         “How so?” Joker asked.

         “Past theories required others being unaffected. Miranda only one unaffected. Makes all past theories impossible. Top priority will be finding cure.”

         “What?! No. Our top priority should be getting EDI back online. She can use the repair drones that Shepard bought to fix the engines and help you with your tests.”

         “Seems like a good idea to me.” Miranda said. All of us on the table jumped a little. Miranda lowered her hand and let the rest of my team on the table.

         “I still think our best course of action is to fix the engines first. Get us moving. Then worry about EDI.” Garrus said.

         “Can’t do anything until crew restored to normal size!” Mordin insisted.

         “Commander Shepard what do you think?” Miranda asked. “You are the commanding officer.” Everyone looked at me awaiting my answer.

15533222222222222211.content:
A cool breeze plays across your skin, gently bringing goosebumps to rise along your arms, causing you to stir in your bed. This chilly caress slowly drags you from the comforting folds of slumber, and into the light of day as you open your eyes. Dark, rain laden clouds drift by on the breeze, creating an overall dreary atmosphere as you groan loudly and turn over, reaching to grasp a pillow and pull it over your head. A cold, numbing shock fills your hand as you jar your fingers against something cool and hard. Stifling a cry of pain you sit up, bolt straight as you turn your gaze towards your "pillow". A large, smooth boulder glistening with moisture lays buried in muddy soil where your pillow used to be. "What the hell?" You'd ask, still drowsy as you struggle to your feet.




The sickly sweet smell of marshy ground and brackish water fill your nostrils as you look about wildly. You can see nothing but giant swathes of prickly green-brown grasses that tower over you, blocking your view in every direction. You reach up to rub the grittiness out of your eyes, telling yourself it was just a dream, but even as you do so you feel the freezing cold mud working its way between your toes as you look down. Silencing the urge to panic you look around lower, only to find that your bed was nowhere to be found and your body is caked in the cold, foul smelling muck that surrounds you. "Hello?!" You cry out "Is anyone out there?!"




A loud rustling fills the air as you whip about wildly, searching for the source of the noise. A massive, dark form suddenly breaks through the grass, towering over you. "My my, what do we have here?" A low, sultry voice coos as you gaze upwards, your legs numb with cold and fear. A giant woman grins down at you, her full lips drawn upwards as she stares down at you with strange, honey golden eyes. Swathed in skin tight leather leggings bound with black belts and a skirt made of the same material, she gently leans forwards, exposing her breasts as the red shall that covered her tits shifted forward, revealing her perky nipples. With a strange glint in her eyes, she reaches up to sweep some of her long, raven black hair out of her face as she bends over, hand outstretched as she reaches for you.



What shall you do?
15533222222222222211.title: Witch of the Wilds

1553322222222222222222221.content:
Okay so I thought I might start off the story by saying that there are many impossible story and set ups for a story with Alice weather it be in the real world or Wonderland. Considering the dark nature of the games in general you could make the story violent, or maybe wonderland reverts to normal (well okay more normal), or what if something happens and leaves her with her powers in the real world, a villainous could grow or shrink her or vieceversa, there are no limits to what can happen and what kind of story's will happen.

For the unfortunate people who haven't played either game,(I pity you) if you have skip to the costumes. Alice is not the Disney version well all used to know. The story is more of a Gothic and horror take on wonderland and a commentary on insane asylum. Alice Liddell herself has extreme survivors guilt from her family's death in a house fire she is also bipolar going from being strong willed and brave to, pure rage, fear, and extreme sadness. She also has many power such as, Shrink and shrink sense useful also for dodging but fighting while Alice is tiny is difficult as she takes double damage from each hit, and her own attacks are less but she can shrink and return to her previous size at any time, giant Alice (self explanatory) she can stomp and swat at enemy's and structures, Hysteria, Floating, and being able to turn into butterflies.

As fro her attire there are multiple outfits that she wears here is a list of them in general she is quite short standing only 5,4.
Her London appearance http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...

Classic dress http://images.wikia.com/americanmcgeesal...

Doll outfit http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...

Royal suit http://images.wikia.com/americanmcgeesal...

Siren aka barefoot outfit http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...
So lets get started!

Alice awoke from looking around the room it looked like her old house she turned over to see her normal dress hanging on she door. Before long a giant high healed foot stamped right in front of her tiny frame. She was bowled over laying on her back stunned at not only the person in front of her, but the scale of everything she must have been only three inches tall the queen was hundreds of feet tall in comparison.

The queen cackled at Alice's size "oh my my, how the mighty have fallen hmm. The last time we met what did you do?... Alice shook her head it would be best to play along until she could escape or just grow not that she has much choice in the matter if the queen is angered her life rests in the palm of her hand literally and the mere thought of the woman being any bigger was truly terrifying. Well its not going to end this way!" he grabbed the self destruct trigger only to be inturupted.

He stares at a stupefying view of Alice's gigantic face peering into the cockpit smiling sweet but mockingly at him . She then lifted her foot over the glass and stomped down shattering the glass and breaking both his legs." She plucked him out with her fingers examining him closely, he wore a pilot helmet obscuring his face "you fought very bravely, I will give you a honorable death." She raised him over her mouth just before she dropped him, he pulled a leaver on his suit he plummeted for what surly felt like a lifetime until she swallowing him whole patting her stomach in content. As she noticed the no barren suit spark and then self destruct, annihilating what was left of the city. " Oh well it was fun while it lasted." She said to herself as she dozed off. Dose the story end here?

155332222222222222222222121.content:
Alice ran through the streets weaving in and out of the crowds panting from not being the best runner. She arrived at her workplace, a bar were she acted as a waitress and maid for patrons who stayed the night. Needless to say she hated most of the patrons and some of the other staff, she sometimes even caught her coworkers talking about her.

Unfortunately today her "guests" were a local gang of thieves. as soon as she walked through the door they were starring at certain body parts her she feared about what they were saying . She tried to shake it off and continue working but the started calling and motioning to her, until she couldn't take it anymore she finally responded to a sharp whistle. She sighed and produced a fake smile, "um hi....could I get you gentlemen something." she said pushing back her normal cynical tone. There were five of them some of there faces obscured to stay anonymous, then the leader spoke in a gravely voice well you could start by getting us a round of ale, then "entertaining" me." Alice singed trying to stay calm and ignoring his comment and retrieved his order.

She returned with the drinks, but when she refused his offer a second time things became heated. Alice turned her back on him only to feel his hand latch onto her dress holding her still. She panicked and slapped him across the face, he slowly stood up to his full height, looking very intimidating. Alice could only make out his eyes from his face being obscured by a banana but she could still see the anger rising in his eyes his hand reaching for a knife." S.s.sir I'm very sorry, but you frightened me don't do anything well both regret." She spoke with fear while slowly backing away. Suddenly there was a loud cracking sound ending the fight, they all turned too see the bartender Ethan loading a rifle and training it on the leader. "You five get out." he barked as the thieves made a quick exit.

Alice stood trembling from the event thankful for the intervention. She thanked him warmly before he handed her a drink and muffin, she reached for her money only to have him reject it. She never liked these bitter drinks but anything to help her calm down was welcome to her. She was about to take a bite when she noticed something written on the plate not only that it seemed.....familiar "eat me? Someone must be playing a joke." She ignored it and began sipping until she felt sick and light headed almost fainting as she noticed the glass was now smaller in her hand, she made sure no one noticed her sudden growth spurt and ran out of the bar in such a hurry she didn't notice someone was fallowing her. "Oh no no no not this not here its your imagination." She soon found herself in a dead end, when she turned she found the thieves closing in on her. "Hello love do you remember me? Alice began cowering fearing what they might do "no please I wont tell anyone just let me go!" "Aww shh were just going to have a little fun, don't worry little one, it wont hurt.. mostly." Alice closed her eyes preparing for the worst.

"Hey, what the hell's the matter with her?" She opened her eyes to find she was growing rapidly 15ft, 20ft, 30ft, until she stopped at 40 feet tall. She smiled down on her would be assailants replaying the events in her head. The thieves made a mad dash for the other end, but there speed was no match for alice's new found size and she quickly blocked there path hands on hips in a annoyed manner. She reached down snatching up the leader who writhed in attempts to escape "get the hell off!" "were just going to have a little fun, but I can assure you it will hurt." She pondered what she should do with them.

1553322222222222222222222211.title: Eleanor Lamb

15533222222222222222222222112.content: Just one more thing... Will this be set during the game, when Eleanor is still isolated in Persephone's Quarantine Chamber? Or will it be set after the game, when Eleanor is trying to live a normal/destructive life on the surface?
15533222222222222222222222112.title: Eleanor It Is

155332222222222222222222221121.content:
Eleanor groggily rose and stretched from her bed at the center of her quarters in Persephone, the most intransigent prison in all of Rapture. Wiping her sleep-crusted eyes, the aged Little Sister’s head swiveled around the room and took in its usual sights- the maroon-teal pattern floor, the homely wallpaper, the scattered books and building blocks, and the warm lamps that lit each table. When Eleanor had first heard from her mother that she was to be imprisoned in a place called the “quarantine chamber,” she had expected a white, sterile cubicle similar to what one might expect to find in a mental hospital. She had to grudgingly admit that what she ended up with wasn’t all that bad, especially compared to the rest of Rapture.

Still, Eleanor had long been planning her escape. She knew that her mother was testing her, trying to learn what she could handle mentally and physically. Not the best way to develop a mother-daughter relationship, and despite Sophia’s insistence that her ultimate goals were benevolent, Eleanor wanted no part in them.

Clad in her usual white dress, Eleanor sat up in her bed and wrapped her arms around her knees, thinking about how she was going to get out of Persephone, and later, Rapture. Whatever surrounds this place resists all of my plasmids, Eleanor pondered. Even teleportation doesn’t work… Perhaps, then, the answer isn’t something inside, but outside…

Before Eleanor could continue to formulate escape her plan, she was interrupted by her mother, whose voice crooned over the intercom. “Eleanor,” she announced,” do you feel prepared for today’s regimen of testing?”

Eleanor forced a nod toward the recently-installed security camera in the corner of the room. She had crushed the previous one with telekinesis during a test, but this had caused her mother to come and observe her personally, which was much worse than being watched through a camera. Until she figured out how she would escape in one fell swoop, the rebellious teen had to be patient. Resistance is what got her into this damn chamber in the first place.

“Today will be a test your mind and body,” Sophia droned,” to see what resonance you have to the needs of a marginalized few when you are physically represented by what I wish you to become.”

Whatever the hell that means, Eleanor thought, her mind still slow from its recent awakening.

“I have taken the liberty of acquiring test subjects for your manipulation- some willing, others not. Regardless of their predisposition, you will now spend forty-eight hours alone with them, and how you respond to their presence will allow me to measure how far you have come on your path to becoming a Utopian.”

Yeah, yeah… Just shock me or make me play poker or whatever.

To Eleanor’s surprise, neither of those things seemed to be part of the current regimen. The delivery door at the front of the chamber opened and closed with lightning speed. Eleanor jumped as she heard the door slam shut, and then looked over to see a small cardboard box on the floor. She hopped out of bed, walked over the circular rug that surrounded it, and stepped onto the tile floor that dominated everywhere else. Eleanor’s bare feet shivered as they made contact with the cold linoleum, but she pressed on to see what her mother had in store for this time.

Eleanor picked up the box and brought it back to her sanctuary of carpeting. Its weight was unevenly distributed and ever-shifting. And I thought she wanted everything to be perfect. As she returned to the fuzzy rug, she curled her toes and sighed before sitting down cross-legged with the box in her lap. Summoning a tiny dot of fire on her fingertip, she ran her hand over the tape seal and severed it cleanly. She knew she had no idea what to expect, but when Eleanor opened the box she was still stunned by something that seemed to defy explanation.

It was a group of twelve tiny people, each dressed in a simple garb of a white shirt and pants. Their rank contained six young men and six young women, or so they appeared. The group reacted to the disappearance of their roof by looking upward and shielding their eyes- they must have been trapped in there a while. As some of them began to scream, Eleanor realized that their eyes had adjusted and they were looking at her.

The elder sister thought that there were too possibilities. On one hand, these could actually be some poor individuals who her mother had kidnapped from the surface and shrunken. It didn’t seem too far-fetched, considering she’d captured so many new Little Sisters by deploying the Big Sister militia. On the other hand, they could be genetic abominations specifically built by her mother to test her. That thought made her very angry. Still, like Sophia said, she was going to have to choose what to do with them.
155332222222222222222222221121.title: A Weird Experiment

1553322222222222222222222211212.content:
Eleanor looked upon the small people with an expressionless face, a lone bang of hair brushing against her face. They looked upward at her from inside the box, some in fear, and others in apparent reverence. Regardless of their reactions, Eleanor had made her choice- it didn’t matter what her mother thought. “I know you aren’t real,” Eleanor stated, “I know she created you to test me. You’re abominations, and I’m going to treat you like abominations.”

The fearful small ones fell to their knees and pleaded for mercy. The zealous small ones seemed excited by the prospect of being mistreated. Mother did say that some of them were ‘willing…’ Curious about their willingness, Eleanor reached into the box and snatched one of them up and brought him to her imposing visage. He was a young, average-build Caucasian fellow with scraggly black hair. Eleanor looked closely at his tiny face and saw that he was smiling.

“Why are you so happy?” Eleanor asked.

“I asked for this,” he said,” they told me that I would be offered to a goddess, and they told the truth… Thank you.”

Eleanor smirked. “Quaint,” she said,” So, you don’t care what I do to you?”

“I want to become part of you,” he replied.

“I’ll take that as a ‘no.’” Hm, she thought, continuing to look at his sincere smile, she must have programmed him to be willing… If I oblige him, that might be exactly what she wants. Then again, what do I care about what she wants? I’m just going to kill all these things anyway... Well, I guess he wants me to eat him. I am feeling a little hungry, but maybe disappointing him would be even sweeter.

Ultimately, Eleanor decided…
1553322222222222222222222211212.title: Screw Morals

choices: She was just getting started with having fun with them
She was somewhat moved by the amber girl's words
15533222222222222222222222112121.content:
You know, Eleanor decided, flattening her hand and holding the small man in front of her cliff-like face, I’ll just do whatever the hell I feel like. At this moment, she felt like being exactly what the thing she held wanted.

“Well,” Eleanor hummed, licking her lips, “I suppose I am feeling rather famished.”

The young man kneeled in her flattened palm and said, “Thank you so much… Could you… Could you tell me your name?”

“Er, it’s Eleanor,” the elder sister said, breaking character momentarily, “and I suppose you’d like to know that name for when you’re sizzling away inside my tummy, eh?”

“Yes… Eleanor, I want to be with you. Please, just tell me- if you eat me, will I become part of you forever?”

“Of course.” Not really, Eleanor knew, well, I guess technically whatever material he’s made of will either be absorbed by my body, or the slug’s. But beliefs are more fun than science anyway. Elevating the minute man above her head and assuming her best theatrical tone, she asked, “Are you ready to join with me, then?”

“Holy shit,” an amber-haired woman in the box shrieked,” it’s gonna eat him! Someone do something!”

“Oh, shut up,” Eleanor said, peering into the box and startling a few of its occupants off their feet,” he asked for this anyway.” As the fearful ones reassumed their positions, Eleanor lowered the young man back in front of her face and asked, “You did, didn’t you?”

“Of course, Eleanor,” he replied, standing up straight in his “goddess’s” hand, “Oh, and by the way, my name is Ray-“Without another thought, Eleanor shoved the small one’s torso into her mouth. Her puckered lips engulfed the top half of the tiny man’s body down to his waist, suckling on him like a piece of candy. Eleanor’s tongue rose and slithered all over the young man’s upper body, soaking his shirt with saliva and poking around his face. “Hmph,” she snuffled as she explored his miniscule features. He actually tastes quite nice… Maybe I’ll dispose of others this way.

As Eleanor continued to sample the man’s flavor, he began thrashing about inside her mouth. His legs frantically kicked at the air outside, occasionally brushing against the tip of their captress’s nose. He must have been dazed for a moment, but I thought he wanted to be gobbled up? Eleanor then felt his hands grip her lower row of teeth and push against them in an apparent escape attempt. Eleanor noticed that he was starting to slide out from between her lips, so she tightened her grip around his midsection in response. Why is he… Oh, he wanted to tell me his name. Well, I got half of it. Ray, I think…? Not that it matters now, little one- you’re food now.

Eleanor wedged her tongue beneath Ray’s chest and aligned it with her throat like an entry ramp. In you go! The elder sister slurped the tiny man’s whole body into her cavernous maw, but before swallowing, she took a moment to appreciate his flavor once more. Mmm… Eleanor’s eyes softly shut as Ray’s light form sank into her tongue. She shuddered, feeling nearly orgasmic at his taste. Unfortunately, her eyes shot back open as the small one began crawling over her tongue toward her sealed lips in another escape attempt. Hmph, fine… I actually liked you more when you didn’t fight it. Time to end this.

Eleanor tilted her head back and felt as Ray slid over her tongue, but at the moment she expected him to be sucked down her gullet, she felt something different instead. The tiny one had grabbed onto her uvula and was now dangling over the entrance to her throat. Eleanor grunted as she felt a strong tug against the sensitive organ. While her enhanced biology made it easy for her to resist vomiting, Ray’s defiance was still annoying. She swallowed again, but the young man’s grip tightened around the pulsing strand and he managed to hold firmly to his lifeline. Eleanor then rolled her tongue backwards in an attempt at prying him off, but again he resisted.

As Eleanor’s tongue settled back into its resting place, the elder sister heard her meal voicing a muffled protest from inside her mouth. She couldn’t make out much, but the one word that seemed the most prominent was “please.” This is more than just him wanting to tell me his name… I think he regrets his decision. Well, you know what? Too bad.

A mischievous smirk curled around Eleanor’s lips as she thought of a way to end this pitiful little struggle. With her lips sealed tight, she allowed saliva to build up in her mouth until it filled her cheeks to the point of ballooning outward. The young lady took a deep breath through her nostrils and closed her eyes once again. Ray wrapped his arms tightly around the uvula in preparation for the next esophageal assault.

Eleanor swung her head back and performed a final, decisive gulp. The waves of saliva washed over Ray and slickened his organic rope, causing him to slip and fall into the entry to the throat. As he entered Eleanor’s gullet, a loud, wet *GLUCK* could be heard outside, startling the tinies in the box. A fat, wriggling distension, carrying Ray’s body and what felt to him like a gallon of spit, down the girl’s neck and past her collarbone.

Eleanor breathed a satisfied sigh and peered down at the box of tiny creatures. Regardless of their predisposition toward her, they all returned her gaze in shock. “It actually did it,” the woman from earlier muttered, gradually developing into yelling, “It actually fucking ate him. Why… Why us? What the hell is this happening to us?”

Eleanor emitted a cute *URP* and rubbed her stomach. “Mm, I can feel him moving. She even got survival instincts right when she created them.”

The amber one dropped to her knees and asked, “Please... Eleanor, right?” Please, you have to understand that whatever you think we are, we’re real people… With feelings, okay?” Eleanor lowered her head and locked eyes with the small woman, poking her belly all the way. “So, please… You can understand me, right? We’re people. Don’t hurt us, okay?”

Eleanor felt that…

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It was turning into a very rough week for the Frye Twins despite their pledge to free all of the free world of London from the ultra tight grip of the Templars they were already suffering massive losses several of their fellow gang member recruits had been either captured,brain washed back into serving the Enemy's cause or out right killed and they were running low on plans to gain a foothold until that is their good friend Charles Darwin,famed biologist called Eve or Evie in for a secret meeting inside their well hidden small warehouse "Ahhh Miss Frye sorry for the sudden interruption but I've just invented a new product that may aid in turning the tides of this war for London." As he showed her a tiny vial or glass of what looked like purple ooze Evie looked highly confused but interested at the same time as she examined it
"And what will this do may I ask Mr. Darwin?"
"It is a rather strange concoction I created by accident after fiddling with various chemicals Miss Frye(As he showed her a few household chemicals and such used in London at that time on a nearby table) and have already taken the liberty of testing it on well see for yourself...." As he gestured to a ordinary potted plant in the room only now the plant inside was the size of a single story house Evie's eyes widened in shock she didn't even notice the thing practically covering up a majority of the room before!
"My word its...its.....enormous! And...and all this because of a simple potion of that bizarre purplish liquid?" Charles Darwin nodded
"Yes amazing isn't it? And to think a few little drops could make your everyday average ordinary plant grow like that!" Evie examined the over-sized plant then looked back at him in utter confusion
"And you're sure this stuff is safe to digest sir? For people that is?" Mr. Darwin shrugged
"That I honestly have no clue my dear you see I just invented this...well I'm calling it the Supersizing Potion,I'll work out the proper name a bit later early this morning and haven't had time to test it on a living moving creature until now....' As he paused and stared blankly at her and once more her eyes widened
"You...you mean you want me to....." He nodded
"Yes you see this may be the hope we're looking for imagine you at about a hundred feet tall towering over all of London's enemies able to effortlessly wade through gunfire,explosions etc without as much as a simple cut! I'm terribly sorry to have to put you through this Miss Evie but time is running out and we're losing valuable allies,the Templars Movement is getting stronger than ever this may be our only chance! Please do it for the sake of London itself!" He looked highly pleading and part of her wanted to strongly say "NO!" but then she thought on the positive side
"Who knows it could be a bit fun being BIG and I always was the shorter of the two! Besides as he said this country really needs our help and I'll take any source available...." Then she smiled and spoke out-loud
"Alright Mr. Darwin for the sake and the freedom of London I'll(gulp) do it!" As he nodded and handed her the vial of purple stuff and stepped out of the room into a smaller one and took a sip of the stuff "Yuck tastes revolting but I got to do this!" She thought and holding her nose she gulped it all down the last thing she heard before she blacked out was Mr. Darwin's words
"Now do be extra careful Miss Frye I have no earthly idea on how long you may remain a giant or what effects that stuff could have on your brain or state of mind." But once she awoke and found indeed she was giant-sized at least over fifty feet tall all of London and its population looked like a miniature doll town to her.....
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eve gone giant!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Isabelle yawns as she woke up, smiling as she went into the kitchen, making her normal breakfast. After she finished, she noticed she was still a little hungry so she made some extra toast. As she prepared to leave for the office, she noticed her shoes felt a little snug. She shrugged it off. Her normal 5 ft 1 stature was now 5 ft 3, though it wasn't big enough a difference to be noticed, yet. After Isabelle walks in, she heads to her desk and sits down, kicking her shoes off. The mayor had very nice carpet in the personal offices, so it felt nice against her feet. She smiles and says "I'll have to look into getting some comfier shoes!" then she begins working. As the hours went on, the growth kept pulsing through her. By time to go home, 5 ft 4. Before she can head home, the mayor pops in and offers her a vacation. She thinks about it for a few minutes and then shakes her head, saying "No, thank you, sir." and he shrugs, handing her the keys to the townhall, asking her to lock up for him because he was going bowling with the guys. He gives her a quick hug, as they always did. She smiles as she finishes up, locking the doors. She walked home barefoot with her shoes in her bag. She giggled a little as the grass slightly tickled her feet. She began reconsidering getting shoes.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Slow!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: She gave a soft, adorable yawn as she awoke from her slumber. She stretches out and smiles brightly, saying "Wow! That's the best sleep I've had in ages!" then she walks into her bathroom, she blinks, having to raise the mirror a bit, she was a little short so she always had it pretty low. She shrugged, saying "Impossible. Fully grown creatures don't just grow overnight!" and she began having second thoughts. She figured it best not to worry about it as she made her breakfast. And extra. More extra than yesterday. She looks down at her feet-paws and says "I think I'm gonna go barefoot." with a giggle, she began speaking again "I guess I have big feet. Good thing the mayor knows those places that can do custom shoes for me~" with a smile. She stretches her now 5 ft 8 body out and decides..
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She grows while sleeping.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: After a short walk to work, Isabelle began yet another day of work. She had grown another inch since her growth began. The mayor walked in, asking Isabelle how she slept, how her breakfast was, and so on. Then he asks "Isabelle? Is there something.. Off? About you?" and she looks down, shrugging, saying "I'm not sure, Mr Mayor. But I don't feel off." then he says "Maybe it's just me." and she stands up, he gasps, saying "Okay. Not me. You grew!" then she examines her own body, a bright smile came upon her face, and she says "I've always wanted to be taller!" then she jumps up with a giggle, touching the high ceilings, she could only touch them thanks to her jump. She jumps quite well.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: To head to work!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: She walks over to the wall and asks the mayor to measure her. After he takes a few measurements he says "You're 5 ft 9 inches, Isabelle." then she squeals, saying "That tall?! Awesome!" and she grabs the measuring stuff, the mayor turns away as she measures her bust, saying "I've grown two cup sizes! I better get a new bra." with a soft, adorable giggle. She gives the mayor a hug and goes back to working with a brighter than normal smile.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She continues growing at her current pace.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
You suddenly gasped in a breath and sat up, you remembered nothing about what had happened. Looking around you, you noticed some wood furnishings, a red-sheeted bed, a… a unicorn? You started it for a few moments then realized it was probably stuffed because it wasn’t moving. But everything around you was so huge! It dawned on you that everything probably wasn’t huge, but you were tiny.

The surface that you were sitting on seemed to be a soft cushion. As you were taking in your surroundings, you heard a door open then close on the other side of the room. You gasped as a beautiful woman dressed in black and white started to walk towards you…
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Shrunk by Yennefer

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The woman didn’t seem to know you were there, she was just approaching the desk that you happened to be on the chair for. You tried to get up, but you were too exhausted from whatever happened before you were seemingly shrunk. As the woman approached you made out the unmistakable scent of lilac and gooseberries.

All that you could do was watch as she approached the chair and slid it back slightly. You were partially in awe of the giant woman’s beauty. She was all that any man could ask for, a perfect hourglass figure with a round ass, and you glimpsed her ample breasts as she passed over the chair.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Patrolling around the medical platform wasn’t a particularly glorious job, but it was one that was deemed necessary. Especially now that there was a strange prisoner that Commander Miller seemed to have a strange grudge against. Miller made sure that there were eyes on her almost at all times. Naturally, that happened to be your job almost every night.

Quiet gave you a death stare one time that you looked down into her cell only to crack a devious smile across her face. You quickly started patrolling again, but still thinking about it creeped you out. Needless to say, you didn't like your assignment. You were nearing Quiet's holding cell and you glanced over and saw her laying down on her cot. She didn't seem to notice you, so you kept walking.

’Why did I have to get stuck with this job?’ You thought, as you kept walking towards the edge of the platform. ’Surely there is someone else that would be all over guard duty… Who am I kidding?

You started down the stairs to the catwalks that skirted the edges of all of the platforms, taking a look at the sunset out over the ocean. At least you got to take in the few and far between sights worth looking at on guard duty. Your thoughts were interrupted while you were walking down the stairs by a metallic clanging sound from below you.

As far as you knew you were the only person that was supposed to be down here, “Hey, who’s there?” You called out, and after receiving only silence as an answer. You started down the stairs in pursuit of the sound.

The sounds source of the sound had been near one of the lifeboats, and on closer inspection you found what looked like a high caliber rifle shell. Suddenly you heard a thud on the catwalk behind you, and right behind you was the culprit.

Quiet walked right up to you, causing you to recoil as she gently took the shell out of your hands, and gave you a sly smile. You weren’t sure what to make of this, but before you could properly react Quiet’s mascara flashed over her face and she lunged forward and wrapped her arms around you, pressing her breasts against your chest. You stiffened and tried to push back, but her grip was strong.

You felt strangely weaker and could barely struggle against Quiet, your vision went blurry and you started to descend. Your nosed brushed against one of Quiet’s breasts, and she released you as you continued to descent. But you weren’t falling. Your feel were still firmly planted on the ground… Were… You were shrinking! It occurred to you as you were only about an inch tall.

After you seemed to stop shrinking your vision sharpened again, and you looked up to see Quiet towering over you. There was a devious smile on her face as she put both of her hands on her hips and seemed to enjoy towering over you for a few second sliding her hands along her thighs as she crouched down to get closer to you, and gently picked you up. Your vision went dark as her fingers wrapped around you.
